recommended_topic: What could happen if the US strikes Iran? | BBC News
rationale: This video has performed well historically and is a popular topic among news enthusiasts.
target_title: US Strikes Iran: What Could Happen?
description_template: The US appears poised to strike Iran within days. So, if no last-minute deal can be reached with Tehran and President Donald Trump decides to order US forces to attack, then what are the possible outcomes? The BBC's security correspondent Frank Gardner talks through seven scenarios.
